terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.content:
## 1. Introduction
These Terms and Conditions govern the use of the LingoCafe.app language learning application. By using the app, you agree to these terms.

## 2. Account Registration
To access the app, users must register an account using their email address. This email is used for account verification and for sending occasional reminders and insights related to the app.

## 3. Use of the App
LingoCafe.app is free of charge. Users are encouraged, but not obliged, to support the app through donations via Patreon or similar platforms.

## 4. User Responsibilities
Users are responsible for the security of their own account and must not share their login credentials.

## 5. Intellectual Property
All content within LingoCafe.app is the property of the app developers. Users may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works without permission.

## 6. Termination of Use
The app developers reserve the right to terminate or restrict access to any user who violates these terms.

## 7. Changes to Terms
These terms may be updated periodically. Continued use of the app implies acceptance of the revised terms.

## 8. Governing Law
These terms are governed by the laws of the country where the data is stored (Europe).

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content:
## 1. Introduction
This policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect user data in LingoCafe.app.

## 2. Data Collection
We collect the following user data:
- Email for account registration
- App usage data (content read, words learned, usage frequency)

## 3. Use of Data
Data is used for account management, app personalization, and sending occasional emails with reminders and insights.

## 4. Data Storage and Protection
Data is stored in Europe and will not leave European territory. The data is protected with industry-standard security measures.

## 5. Owner of Data
The data is owned by Marco Pegoraro and will never be disclosed to third parties or collaborators.

## 6. User Rights
Users have the right to access, rectify, or delete their data. Requests should be directed to the app's contact information.

## 7. Changes to Privacy Policy
This policy may be updated periodically. Continued use of the app implies acceptance of the revised policy.

## 8. Contact Information
For any questions regarding these terms or privacy policy, users can contact babelifyapp@gmail.com.
